projects.title: Auction House Project: Leveraging AI for Business
projects.overview: At a pre-eminent estate auction house in Rhode Island, I led the integration of Large Language Models (LLMs) to optimize and automate the appraisal, listing, and warehousing processes for estate goods. This initiative resulted in significant operational improvements and scaled the business to multiple times its original size. Reporting directly to the CEO, I oversaw the design and implementation of advanced solutions that enhanced efficiency and elevated the customer experience.
contributions: Designed and implemented AI-driven solutions to streamline appraisal and listing processes.
Optimized warehousing operations using advanced data analytics and machine learning techniques.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration of AI technologies.
Resulted in patented intellectual property (IP) for innovative AI-driven solutions.
Provided strategic insights and recommendations to the CEO based on data-driven analysis.
achievements: Achieved significant operational improvements, enhancing overall efficiency.
Scaled the business to multiple times its original size through AI-driven optimizations.
Elevated the customer experience by implementing advanced AI solutions.

projects.title: OSCA: Consulting and Community Building
projects.overview: Since 2022, I have contributed to the Ocean State Chess Association’s strategic direction as a consultant. Working collaboratively, I helped propose and organize a centennial celebration for a local centenarian, which has since evolved into a memorial tournament honoring their legacy. OSCA’s recognition as the official US Chess Rhode Island State Affiliate reflects its growing influence and impact, supported by initiatives aimed at expanding access to chess education and events.
contributions: Co-proposed and designed a centennial celebration for local centenarian Lou Giarrusso.
Helped evolve the celebration into a memorial tournament honoring his legacy.
Contributed to OSCA’s recognition as the official US Chess Rhode Island State Affiliate.
Represented Maine and argued in favor of OSCA at the 2023 US Chess Annual Delegates Meeting in Grand Rapids, MI.
Supported initiatives aimed at expanding access to chess education and events.
achievements: Enhanced the strategic direction of the Ocean State Chess Association.
Designed successful events that fostered community engagement and chess education.
Helped establish OSCA as a recognized and influential organization in the chess community.
projects.seoDescription: Strategic consulting and community-focused chess initiatives.

structuredData.name: Ocean State Chess Association
structuredData.description: Strategic consulting and community-focused chess initiatives.

projects.title: US Chess Tournament Director: Facilitating Competitive Play
projects.overview: As a certified Tournament Director with the United States Chess Federation (US Chess), I have been responsible for organizing and overseeing chess tournaments that adhere to national standards. My role encompasses enforcing rules and regulations, managing tournament pairings, tracking scores, and ensuring fair play. This position requires a comprehensive understanding of chess regulations, strong organizational skills, and the ability to arbitrate disputes impartially. Through this work, I have contributed to the development of the chess community by providing structured and competitive environments for players to engage in the game.
contributions: Organized and oversaw chess tournaments adhering to national standards.
Directed 29 tournaments for OSCA and CSCA combined, including the CT State Championship.
Enforced rules and regulations to ensure fair play.
Managed tournament pairings and tracked scores.
Arbitrated disputes impartially.
achievements: Provided structured and competitive environments for players to engage in the game.
Contributed to the development of the chess community.
Ensured the smooth operation of tournaments through strong organizational skills.
projects.seoDescription: Organizing and overseeing US Chess tournaments to ensure fair play.

projects.title: DarkQueen Chess Engine Development
projects.role: Founding Member and Lead Data Analyst
projects.overview: DarkQueen is a GPU-accelerated neural network chess engine developed to advance machine learning applications in chess. Evolving from its predecessors, AntiFish and BetaOne, DarkQueen aimed to validate the hypothesis that high-quality training data extracted from high-level (2400+) human games could enhance engine performance beyond traditional random initialization methods.
contributions: Training Data Analysis: Conducted comprehensive analyses of training games to evaluate and compare the performance of successive engine generations, both statistically and analytically.
Benchmarking Development: Worked alongside engineers and theoreticians to create new benchmarking test suites for chess engines, facilitating more accurate performance assessments.
Project Evolution: Played a pivotal role in transitioning from CPU-based to GPU-based architecture, enhancing computational efficiency and enabling more complex neural network models.
Research Validation: Contributed to efforts replicating and extending Google DeepMind's AlphaZero experiments, focusing on the impact of high-quality data in neural network training.
achievements: Enhanced the strategic capabilities of neural network-based chess engines through innovative training methodologies.
Advanced the understanding of high-quality human data's role in machine learning within computer chess.
Developed a competitive chess engine that participated in prestigious tournaments, including Chess.com's Computer Chess Championship.
Achieved a peak rating of 3458.5 on Chess.com, reflecting significant advancements in engine strength.
projects.seoDescription: Developing a GPU-accelerated neural network chess engine.

projects.title: AntiFish Chess Engine Development
projects.role: Founding Member and Lead Data Analyst
projects.overview: AntiFish is a neural network-based chess engine developed by Cscuile, designed to identify and exploit weaknesses in traditional engines like Stockfish. Built upon the Leela Chess Zero (Lc0) framework, AntiFish aimed to enhance neural network performance against classical alpha-beta search engines.
contributions: Training Data Analysis: Conducted comprehensive analyses of training games to evaluate and compare the performance of successive engine generations, both statistically and analytically.

Synthetic Data Generation: Proposed and worked with lead engineer to implemented the innovative use of Stockfish to generate high-quality synthetic training data, enhancing the robustness of the neural network's learning process.
Collaborated with leading engineers and theoreticians to create new benchmarking test suites for chess engines.

Project Evolution: Played a pivotal role in the conceptualization and development of DarkQueen, a GPU-based chess engine forked from AntiFish, to further explore and validate advanced machine learning applications in chess.

Research Validation: Contributed to efforts aimed at replicating and extending the proof-of-concept experiments conducted by Google DeepMind with AlphaZero, focusing on the hypothesis that higher-quality data could outperform random initialization in neural network training.
achievements: Enhanced the performance and strategic capabilities of neural network-based chess engines through innovative training methodologies.
Advanced the understanding of synthetic data's role in machine learning, particularly within the domain of computer chess.
Contributed to the development of competitive chess engines that participated in prestigious tournaments, including Chess.com's Computer Chess Championship.
Finished clear 1st place in the CCC6 Winter Classic Stage 1 (5|2).
Finished clear 4th place in the CCC8 Deep Dive (15/5)
projects.seoDescription: Enhancing chess engine performance with neural networks and synthetic data.

projects.title: A Literation: A Platform for Creative Talent
projects.overview: A Literation, a literary journal I revitalized, serves as a platform for emerging poets, writers, and artists. By publishing their work, often for the first time, the journal provided an entry point into the broader literary world. Notably, one contributor was later featured in The Penguin Book of Indian Poets, underscoring the journal’s role in fostering new voices. This initiative reflects my commitment to promoting creativity and supporting the development of artistic talent.
contributions: Revitalized the literary journal to provide a platform for emerging talent.
Published works of poets, writers, and artists, often for the first time.
Facilitated the entry of contributors into the broader literary world.
Supported the development of artistic talent through mentorship and editorial guidance.
achievements: Managed a team of dedicated editors
Published works of emerging poets, writers, and artists
Distributed through Amazon and other outlets
One contributor was later featured in The Penguin Book of Indian Poets.
Established the journal as a respected platform for new voices in the literary community.
projects.seoDescription: Revitalizing a literary journal to support emerging poets and writers.

projects.title: Be the Whale Workshopping Group
projects.overview: "Be the Whale" was a Discord-based community I established to bring poets together for collaboration and growth. The group became a creative hub where members shared work, exchanged feedback, and explored the craft of poetry. This project illustrates my ability to create and nurture communities that inspire artistic development and meaningful dialogue.
contributions: Founded and managed a Discord community for poets and writers.
Facilitated workshops, feedback sessions, and collaborative projects.
Created a supportive environment for artistic growth and development.
Organized events and activities to engage and inspire members.
achievements: Built a thriving community of poets and writers.
Fostered meaningful dialogue and collaboration among members.
Supported the development of artistic talent through mentorship and feedback.
projects.seoDescription: Creating a Discord-based community for poets to collaborate and grow.

projects.title: Raise The Curve: A Poetry Blog on Tumblr
projects.overview: As the creator of raisethecurve, a widely recognized poetry blog on Tumblr, I curated original poetic works and engaged with a global literary audience. The blog, which reached nearly 100,000 followers at its peak, was spotlighted by Tumblr as one of only a dozen blogs recommended to new accounts for representing the platform’s poetry community. Additionally, I served as a Tag Editor, assisting the platform in highlighting new and outstanding talent. This role reflects my ability to combine literary artistry with community leadership and digital engagement.
contributions: Curated and published original poetic works, engaging a global audience.
Self-published a poetry collection entitled "Before I Leave" to much acclaim.
Editor for Burning Muse and Recognizing the Voiceless, blogs that curated new and powerful voices in the Tumblr writing community.
Built a following of nearly 100,000 followers at its peak.
Spotlighted by Tumblr as one of a dozen recommended blogs for new accounts.

Founding member of Critical Inking, a review and feedback blog which paired writers with peers who gave feedback and advice on the craft, workshopping submissions and posting the dialogue for the community to see.
Served as a Tag Editor, highlighting new and outstanding talent.
achievements: Established a widely recognized poetry blog with a significant following.
Contributed to the promotion and recognition of new literary talent.
Demonstrated the ability to combine literary artistry with community leadership and digital engagement.
projects.seoDescription: Managing a widely recognized poetry blog to engage a global literary audience.

projects.title: Personal Website Development
projects.overview: Developed a fully static website hosted on GitHub Pages using VS Code, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with collaborative help from GitHub Copilot. The site leverages a modular responsive design, engaging animations and visuals, and an innovative ad-injector technology to dynamically manage content.
contributions: Designed and implemented a modular, responsive layout to ensure optimal performance across devices.
Integrated dynamic animations and visuals to enhance user engagement.
Developed an ad-injector technology to manage and display contextual advertisements seamlessly.
Collaborated using GitHub Copilot, optimizing development efficiency within a two-day timeframe.
achievements: Delivered a fully functional and visually engaging website in just two days.
Showcased advanced front-end development techniques with responsive design and dynamic content injection.
Enhanced user experience with smooth animations and proactive performance optimizations.
projects.seoDescription: Developed a static website on GitHub Pages featuring a modular responsive design, dynamic animations, and an innovative ad-injector technology.

structuredData.name: Personal Website Development
structuredData.description: A static website built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript with advanced responsive design and dynamic content injection.

projects.title: Pawn Island Shopify Store: Apparel & Art
projects.overview: Launched a Shopify store on pawnisland.myshopify.com, featuring apparel and other items adorned with original designs. The visuals, created with collaborative AI tools like ChatGPT, Midjourney, and Grok, then refined using Paint.net, share a unique style, sense of humor, and Christian inspiration.
contributions: Designed and curated original merchandise using collaborative AI-assisted tools.
Managed the Shopify store to deliver a unique brand experience.
Integrated creative design elements that reflect a modern aesthetic and inspirational themes.
achievements: Successfully launched an online platform for original, art-driven apparel.
Built a cohesive brand that merges technology, design, and inspirational messaging.
projects.seoDescription: Pawn Island Shopify store offering original apparel and accessories with unique AI-assisted designs and Christian inspiration.

structuredData.name: Pawn Island Shopify Store
structuredData.description: An online store offering apparel and accessories featuring original designs created with AI tools and inspired by Christian themes.
